p: The recently obtained M. pneumoniae whole genome sequence datasets suggest that p1 gene type 2b and 2c strains have common sequence variations in the orf6 gene (MPN142), which differentiate these strains from other type 2 strains [ 25, 26]. Therefore, we have sequenced the orf6 region of strains M282 and K708 and revealed that the type 2f strain M282 had a novel, 90-bp long sequence variation at the 5â€² end of the orf6 gene (GenBank accession no. LC390170) ( S1 Fig). Furthermore, the orf6 sequence of the type 2f strain K708 (GenBank accession no. LC420352) was identical to that of the type 2 strain FH (GenBank accession no. CP017327) ( S1 Fig).
